title: Bug 122077Set visibility for the item inside a table which extends from a library, its setting doesn't work.
OB: Bug 122077Set visibility for the item inside a table which extends from a library, its setting doesn't work. it is still visibile.
SR: Descirption: Set visibility for the item inside a table which extends from a library, its setting doesn't work.Steps to reproduce:1. Extend a table from library to report design file.2. Select a label in the table and set its visibility, hide element in html/pdf.3. Preview in html/pdf.
